text: Delicious sushi bar, I go here often with my girlfriend. Decently priced, with a lot of vegetarian options.

ThierryD 
Groupe fête de Julie 32 personnes 17:30.
A déconseillé pour les groupes 25+
A cause des heures des 2 services. 1er a 17:30 et 2ème a 20:00 Excellente qualités de Sushis. Sauf que mon groupe a été "rucher" pour commander et Service un peu lent pour avoir de l'eau et avec le dessert aucun service de thé ou cafe vue qu'à 20:00 on étais encore la. Pour les prochains groupes c'est a vos risque.

La nourriture est bonne, mais le Mitsuki de Saint-Hubert n'est pas comparable à celui du Quartier Dix30. Un beau décor, mais les tables sont beaucoup trop entassées comparé aux autres Mitsuki. On remarque sur le menu que ce ne sont pas tous les sushis qui sont disponibles, certaines sortes sont seulement pour la livraison ou pour emporter.. Ce qui était un peu décevant. Le service était bien comparé à d'autres restaurants de sushis à volonté, on ne manquait jamais d'eau. Pour vivre une meilleure expérience, celui au Quartier Dix30 est beaucoup mieux et même si Saint-Hubert offre les mêmes sushis, ils sont meilleurs au Dix30. Le seul plus de ce restaurant c'est le apportez votre vin.

This sushi place offers fresh and delicious sushi, probably the best I've ever had.
Their all-you-can-eat is not very exhaustive on lunchtime, but the fact that it's so much cheaper at that time makes it up to you.
I definitely recommand the house specialties, they are all very good.
Service is good, they have a very reserved but polite staff, and you usually don't wait for too long. It can get pretty busy, so plan ahead.
It's also a bring-your-own-wine, which is cool since the SAQ is next door.
Take out is a good option but you have to plan around 45 minutes before it's ready.
Delivery isn't worth it, they charge for it and it takes forever.

Ce restaurant n'est populaire que parce que c'est une formule 'à volonté '. A mon avis , les makis sont quelconque et composés de trop de riz ... Sans saveur . En effet , il faut que le client est le ventre plein rapidement  !

This place is my go-to for great take-out sushi! 
I can't say I have tried the restaurant it self. The place is very nice. And it's often busy. But for take-out, Im loving it. Fast service and great sushi!
One small down fall is that they don't take debit cards.

Petit restaurant très sympa dans la rive sud où la qualité et la fraîcheur des plats le classe dans mon top 5 des restaurants où l'on peut manger à volonté.  Amateur de sushi ou si vous préférez le général tao ou pad thaï vous serez ravis de la variété de leur menu.  
Afin d'apprécié votre souper, pourquoi ne pas l'accompagner avec votre bouteille de vin préféré que vous aurez  vous-même apporté. 
ss

My new place for sushi. Amazing selections. Fresh sashimi cuts melt in your mouth , best octopus sashimi i ever tasted ,very big maki rolls and very tasty. The grilled fish is to die for :) . My kids had 2 dozens of shrimp Tempura and loved.  it. Prices were reasonable for what is served . The restaurant was fully booked and people were waiting in line for the next available table. Despite this we had an implacable service, fast, reliable ; ok they done smile a lot but they were very professional and efficient . I drove 45min from Laval and it was worth it. I cant wait to go eat there again . Highly recommended.

It was the first time I've been here and I can say I was very pleased with the service. For every round I had ordered, the food was fresh, delicious, and hot. 
It was a bit full on the night I had went, therefore, the service was a bit slow, which is understandable. Also, I was willing to pay with debit card, but they do not accept it. Be prepared to pay with credit card or cash.
Otherwise, everything else was well, and I will definitely be back again!
Eating freshy sushi in a beautiful atmosphere with wonderful services. Its certainly one of the best in Brossard. Must try!
